thread.title: Re: ‘Who writes this crap?’ CNN really dug deep for this major scoop
thread.title_full: Re: ‘Who writes this crap?’ CNN really dug deep for this major scoop

author: Orpheus75
title: Re: ‘Who writes this crap?’ CNN really dug deep for this major scoop
text:
— Lachlan Markay (@lachlan) January 31, 2017 
Awww … and after those 12 people put in all that effort! What a damn shame. Now it’s as if they were never there at all! @CNN what a waste of time. 
— Paul Kyle (@Kyley_84) January 31, 2017 @CNN what an incredible waste of time 
— Morning in America (@prosecutingUSA) January 31, 2017 
Seriously, though. This act of “resistance” is a big enough joke as it is. But for CNN to go out of its way to cover it? That’s just comedy gold , right there. I LOL’d so hard I nearly choked. Why is this news? https://t.co/ycvxcQign1
